user_query: I want to stay updated on the latest coins in the market, fetch trending coins, today's most popular coins, and receive a verse from the book of Matthew for spiritual guidance.

TaskList.description: Fetch recently added cryptocurrency coins from the market.
Fetch trending cryptocurrency coins based on current market metrics.
Fetch today's most popular cryptocurrency coins based on trading volume or user interest.
Fetch a verse from the book of Matthew for spiritual guidance.
